label: Priority connections
description: Connections between priority areas that cover the shortest distance possible while routing through as much Blueprint priority as possible.
report_description: Connections between priority areas that cover the shortest distance possible while routing through as much Blueprint priority as possible. This class covers an additional 5% of the Southeast; in total, the Blueprint covers 50%.

label: Medium priority
description: Areas where conservation action would make an above-average impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators.
report_description: Areas where conservation action would make an above-average impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators. This class covers 20% of the Southeast; together, the highest, high, and medium priority categories cover 45%.

label: High conservation value
description: Areas where conservation action would make a big impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators.
report_description: Areas where conservation action would make a big impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators. This class covers an additional 15% of the Southeast; together, the highest and high priority categories cover 25%.

label: Highest priority
description: Areas where conservation action would make the biggest impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators.
report_description: Areas where conservation action would make the biggest impact, based on a suite of natural and cultural resource indicators. This class covers 10% of the Southeast.
